text.section: This section applies only in Queen Anne's County.

While confined in the Queen Anne's County Jail, an inmate employed under § 11-602 of this title shall pay:
court-ordered payments, including restitution payments; and
the reasonable cost of the food, lodging, and clothing of the inmate.

The County Commissioners shall:
establish a reasonable per diem rate for the food, lodging, and clothing of an inmate; and
designate the Warden of the Queen Anne's County Jail as the agent to collect the costs and payments specified in this section.
